C

client - package client
 
Client - Class in client
The main class of the client application containing the main method entry-point It establishes a basic TCP/IP client connection to a server with a specified adress and port
Client() - Constructor for class client.Client
 
ClientFrame - Class in client
Class containing the window(swing frame) of the client GUI main window, extends the JFrame class It has a set, non-resizable dimension based on screen resolution All of the active elements are contained in the panel object The constructor takes two references for server communication purposes It logs out the user on closing
ClientFrame(BufferedReader, PrintWriter) - Constructor for class client.ClientFrame
The constructor of the ServerFrame class.
ClientFrame.CloseAction - Class in client
The inner class for the action listener that listens for actions on the window Implements the ActionListener interface Closing the window (pressing "x") calls the logout(...) method from the ServerCommunicator class and exits the application
ClientFrame.CloseAction() - Constructor for class client.ClientFrame.CloseAction
 
ClientPanel - Class in client
Class containing the panel of the ClientFrame class, extends the JPanel class It contains a text area for the message content, a text field for the user username to send it to and two button "Send message" and "Get messages" Also contains a simple text label "To: " near the text field with the username The buttons functions are depicted by their respective names If the message was sent succesfully a information popup is shown and the receiver text field and message area are cleared If the message was sent unsuccesfully a error popup is shown and the receiver text field is cleared Contains four panels for layout purposes The constructor takes in three refrences, one for the parent frame, and two for calling methods communicating with the server
ClientPanel(ClientFrame, BufferedReader, PrintWriter) - Constructor for class client.ClientPanel
The constructor of the ClientPanel class.
ClientPanel.GetMessagesAction - Class in client
The inner class for the action listener that listens for actions on the "Get messages" button Implements the ActionListener interface Pressing the button gets all messages for the user from the database using the getMessages(...) method from the ServerCommunicator class Then for every message it spawns a MessageFrame class object with the message reference as the constructor paremeter
ClientPanel.GetMessagesAction() - Constructor for class client.ClientPanel.GetMessagesAction
 
ClientPanel.SendMessageAction - Class in client
The inner class for the action listener that listens for actions on the "Send message" button Implements the ActionListener interface Pressing the button calls and checks the result of the sendMessage(...) method from the ServerCommunicator class If the result is true it sends the message, clears the text components and spawns a information popup If the result is false it clears the receiver text field and spawns an error popup
ClientPanel.SendMessageAction() - Constructor for class client.ClientPanel.SendMessageAction
 
contentArea - Variable in class client.MessageFrame
 
create(String, String) - Static method in class server.DatabaseCommunicator
Creates/registers a user in the database returning if it succeded
